thread.title: Walt Disney World Swan, Dolphin Hotel offers Grandparents Day dea
thread.title_full: Walt Disney World Swan, Dolphin Hotel offers Grandparents Day dea | www.palmbeachpost.com

author: Mary Thurwachter
title: Walt Disney World Swan, Dolphin Hotel offers Grandparents Day dea
text:
Grandparents Day is Sept. 13 but can be celebrated all month at the Walt Disney World Swan and Dolphin Hotel, which is offering a special deal for a multigenerational vacation.
Grandparents and their families vacationing at the Epcot Resort area hotel can get a connecting guest room for $109 a night, up to a 50 percent reduction from regular rates, when booking one room at the standard price for stays in September.
Grandparents traveling with grandchildren will find many activities to enjoy, including swan boat rides, at the Walt Disney World Swan and Dolphin Hotel. Contributed The hotel has 17 restaurants and lounges, five pools, two health clubs, tennis, nearby golf, a recently renovated Balinese-inspired Mandara spa and complimentary transportation throughout the Walt Disney World Resort.
For more information, call 800-227-1500 or visit www.swandolphin.com/offers .
</span
